attributes.action: Ban All Councils for charging rent and council tax, until COVID-19 is sorted.
attributes.additional_details: This is your Job, that we, The Public, PAY you to do. Instead of Helping yourselves, Help us. Give us a break. Instead of trying to profit and think of yourselves, Think about us, The Tax payers have paid for TOO Much, for TOO LONG. It's about time we had something back.
attributes.background: With the COVID-19 situation, It looks like the UK will be on lock down. Not everyone can work from home. The councils must not profit, and not let the public suffer more. I see lots of councils seem happy to Rob from the poor. Temporarily abolish all charges, until things are settled.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303274

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
